values: A common vertical discretization is adopted when solving the heat and moisture transfer into the soil (Zhang et al. 2016). In the upper two meters, the discretization  is optimized  for the moisture transfer and for the most nonlinear process (de Rosnay et al., 2000), with 11 nodes from the surface up to 2m. The node distance of each layer below 2 m is set to 1 m, the total depth for the  soil is set to 90m. For the moisture a free drainage condition  implies that soil moisture  is constant below the lower node.
The horizontal grid is  long-lat grid identical to the  one used by the atmospheric model. It has 143 points on the longitude and 142 on the latitude
